question_en: Which of the following is correct? 'The jury ___ reached a verdict.'
question_np: कुन सही छ? 'The jury ___ reached a verdict.'

question_en: Choose the correct sentence in the Subjunctive mood:

options_en: I wish I was a king
I wish I am a king
I wish I were a king
I wish I will be a king
options_np: I wish I was a king
I wish I am a king
I wish I were a king
I wish I will be a king
